headline: Your No Is Sacred
body: You don’t owe your peace to others’ comfort. Boundaries are how you rebuild safety—inside and out.
prompt: What boundary this week could honor the part of you that never had one before?

headline: Boundaries Say: 'I’ve Got Me'
body: Self-trust doesn’t come from affirmations alone—it comes from protection. Set the limit. Keep the promise.
prompt: Where in your life could one clear boundary help restore self-trust this week?

headline: Boundaries Aren’t Just Spoken—They’re Felt
body: Your nervous system knows the difference. Speak from safety, not survival. That’s how you stay anchored.
prompt: What conversation or moment this week might need nervous system grounding before a boundary is set?
